column1: 2 soft erasers 1 ziplock bags (optional, any size)
8 low odor dry -erase markers (black or blue)
Every student needs a Book Bag or Backpack. It is suggested that no rolling book bags be used due
the limited space in classroom. Items may need replacing throughout the year.
• Optional for all classes: box of tissues
• Please make sure that all supplies are safe products that do not emit vapors that are harmful to brew
